equibel.formatters package¶

Submodules¶

equibel.formatters.aspformatter module¶

Formatter to create the Answer Set Programming (ASP) representation of an arbitrary EquibelGraph instance. The ASP format is used when giving a graph to the gringo/clingo ASP tools.

equibel.formatters.aspformatter.to_asp(G, atoms=None)[source]¶
equibel.formatters.aspformatter.convert_formula_to_asp(formula)[source]¶

Creates a string representing a Sympy formula object, formatted as
